dt: {bc}a usually green film formed naturally on copper and bronze by long exposure or artificially (as by acids) and often valued aesthetically for its color
{bc}a surface appearance of something grown beautiful especially with age or use

dt.t: the beautiful {wi}patina{/wi} of this antique table

dt: {bc}an appearance or aura that is derived from association, habit, or established character

dt.t: the criminal has acquired a {wi}patina{/wi} of respectability by his friendship with well-known businessmen
The toast was spread with a {wi}patina{/wi} of butter.

shortdef: a usually green film formed naturally on copper and bronze by long exposure or artificially (as by acids) and often valued aesthetically for its color
a surface appearance of something grown beautiful especially with age or use
an appearance or aura that is derived from association, habit, or established character
